info: A mix of to previous work minted on fxhash, Tes désirs sont désordres and Lost in the attraction / abstraction. Particles are emitted by different zones (with a nailer defined for each zone), the particles move according to a noise (Perlin Noise) but also a plane function (random), each time the color of the the particle is altered by the color that was in its position (add, multiply, lighten, darken).
